Messages.string: Use /home to teleport to your claimed bed!
Be sure to check out our website unturned.plantdown.com
To vote for us head over to unturned-servers.net/server/5206 and click vote by voting you can earn rewards!
To collect your vote reward say /reward, you can do this once a day if you vote
Anyone caught cheating or hacking will be banned!
Don't forget to participate in our Weekly Raffle on the forums!
Every week we have a raffle and you will have a chance to win points!
Don't forget the server ip: play.plantdown.com
To vote for us head over to unturned-servers.net/server/5206 and click vote by voting you can earn rewards!
To collect your vote reward say /reward, you can do this once a day if you vote
Remember this server is PvE only, so you can't kill others here.
Please remember to always speak english in the main chat!
To vote for us head over to unturned-servers.net/server/5206 and click vote by voting you can earn rewards!
To collect your vote reward say /reward, you can do this once a day if you vote
We will be hiring more people to the staff team soon!
To vote for us head over to unturned-servers.net/server/5206 and click vote by voting you can earn rewards!
To collect your vote reward say /reward, you can do this once a day if you vote
Be sure to join our Steam group Unturned Survival Instincts

To collect your vote reward say /reward, you can do this once a day if you vote
To check your wallet say /balance
Every day your online will earn 20 Canadian Dollars

To collect your vote reward say /reward, you can do this once a day if you vote
Canadian Dollars can be spent in the item mall, visit tycoon-city.com for commands.
Our server restarts every two hour, a warning message will be sent 5 minutes before it restarts.
